title: Castle Clinton National Monument: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons       The site is open every day but Christmas (December 25). The site may close in cases of inclement weather. Please call (212) 344-7220 to verify that the site is open on the day you plan to visit.     Sunday Monday Tuesday Wednesday Thursday Friday Saturday   7:45 - 5:00  7:45 - 5:00 7:45 - 5:00 7:45 - 5:00 7:45 - 5:00 7:45 - 5:00 7:45 - 5:00
